text: Zafar Muhammad Lutfar is a National Awami Party (Muzaffar) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Dinajpur-6. ==Career== Lutfar was elected to parliament from Dinajpur-6 as a National Awami Party (Muzaffar) candidate in 1986 and 1988. ==References== Category:National Awami Party (Muzaffar) politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Zafar Muhammad Lutfar
